metadata.title: CVE-2020-8284 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A malicious server can use the FTP PASV response to trick curl 7.73.0 andearlier into connecting back to a given IP address and port, and this waypotentially make curl extract information about services that are otherwiseprivate and not disclosed, for example doing port scanning and servicebanner extractions.

criterions.comment: curl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
